All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BuyInterface
The BuyInterface class provides a graphical user interface for buying investments in the portfolio.
EPortfolioGUI
The EPortfolioGUI class provides a graphical user interface for the Investment Portfolio Management System.
GainInterface
The GainInterface class provides a graphical user interface to display the total gain of the portfolio and the individual gains for each investment.
Investment
 
MutualFund
 
Portfolio
The Portfolio class manages a collection of investments, including stocks and mutual funds.
SearchInterface
The SearchInterface class provides a graphical user interface to search for investments in the portfolio based on various criteria.
SellInterface
The SellInterface class provides a graphical user interface for selling investments in the portfolio.
Stock
 
UpdateInterface
The UpdateInterface class provides a graphical user interface for updating the prices of investments in the portfolio.
